RelatedSentence: - A man has been arrested in a weekend stabbing at a motel that sent another man to the hospital .

A0: Officers with the Metropolitan Nashville Police Department
RelatedSentence: When officers got on the scene , they found Thomas Huff lying on the sidewalk , with a stab wound on the left side of his chest .
Officers followed a trail of blood to room 202 , where they found Robert Mitchell , who allegedly had blood on his shirt and admitted to stabbing Huff .
